orderstatus=#{orderstatus},

mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.modelname,b.filePics, CASE WHEN a.endtime = '' THEN 1 WHEN a.endtime >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END STATUS, CASE WHEN a.cycle = 1 THEN '一个月' WHEN a.cycle = 2 THEN '半年' WHEN a.cycle = 3 THEN '一年' ELSE '永久' END cyclename FROM flowmodel a LEFT JOIN modelinfo b ON a.mid = b.mid WHERE a.uid = #{uid} and b.filePics is not null order by a.saynew ,a.creattime desc
mapper.update: update flowmodel set saynew =2 where uid=#{uid} and mid=#{mid}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.oid, a.orderamount, a.paidtime, b.modelname mname, c.username, case when a.paidmethod =1 then '支付宝' when a.paidmethod =1 then '微信' else '商城币' end strname, case when a.cycle =1 then '一个月' when a.cycle =2 then '半年' when a.cycle =3 then '一年' else '永久' end cyclename FROM orderflow a LEFT JOIN modelinfo b on a.mids=b.mid LEFT JOIN userinfo c on a.uid=c.userid WHERE a.orderstatus =1
and a.uid=#{uid}
and b.modelname like CONCAT('%',#{mname},'%') or c.username like CONCAT('%',#{mname},'%')
ORDER BY a.paidtime desc
